system.purpose: Keep Mutants in check and press them to work
system.careerPreferences: Usually Arch-Militant or Missionary, not Rogue Trader.
system.subordinates: Press Gangers, mutant informants, bilge workers.
system.effect: After Starship combat, can capture and press gang mutant slaves. Regaining 1d5 Crew but losing 1 Morale.
